//: Hidden effect, used to make sure dragonblood can fly.
Hidden effect, lets you cast blood magic with huge benefits
Hidden effect, lets you cast blood magic with benefits
Hidden effect, stops you from killing yourself with sanguine marks

name: Blood Effigy
desc: This is just used for Arcana mutagenic effects.  If you see this, that likely means DDA has bugged out in some way again.

name: Sacramental Heart
desc: This is just used for Arcana mutagenic effects.  If you see this, that likely means DDA has bugged out in some way again.

name: Ritual Blade
desc: This is just used for Arcana mutagenic effects.  If you see this, that likely means DDA has bugged out in some way again.

//: Hidden effect, makes your Arcane Blessings automatically succeed if wielding the Veilblade
Hidden effect, used to distinguish magical quick weather change from the weather returning to normal
Hidden effect, used to track magical summoned fog
Hidden effect, used to track magical summoned rain
Hidden effect, used to track magical summoned rainstorms
Hidden effect, used to track magical summoned lightning storms

name: Pattern Sorcery Exertion
desc: Use of pattern sorcery increases sleepiness gain.
apply_message: You feel a slight sense of exertion from casting the spell.
remove_message: The exertion of spellcasting fades from your mind.

name: Draconic Exertion
desc: Overuse of Sanguine Marks increases hunger gain.
apply_message: You feel your inner fire waver from casting the spell.
remove_message: The strange sense of unease from spellcasting fades.

name: Verdant Boost
desc: Your body's natural stamina and pain recovery is enhanced.
remove_message: The garland's recovery effect fades.
decay_messages: The effect of the verdant triffid garland is starting to fade.

//: Effectively combines some of the perks of Free Action and yellow potion.
This makes you health go down slowly while LSS is in use.

name: Time Stands Still
desc: A spell has given you bonus moves for the moment.
remove_message: The flow of time resumes.

name: Temporal Stimulation
//: This adds the stamina and fatigue effects to TS.

name: Intense Numbness
desc: Your body feels incredibly numb and sluggish.
remove_message: The numbness fades.
decay_messages: The numbing effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Strengthened
desc: You feel mighty, like you could take on the world.
remove_message: The unnatural strength leaves your body.
decay_messages: The strengthening effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Speedy
desc: Your heart feels like it's beating dangerously fast, you can't even think about rest.
remove_message: Your heartbeat slows back down to a normal pace.
decay_messages: The quickening effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Elixir
desc: Not immortality, but it still feels nice.
remove_message: The healing effect fades.
decay_messages: The soothing effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Pleasant Warmth
desc: Your body feels pleasantly warm.
remove_message: The warmth in your body fades.
decay_messages: The warming effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Lingering Malaise
desc: Your body feels weak.
remove_message: The unnatural weakness caused by failing to maintain your virdian potion regimen finally fades.

name: Even Temperature
desc: You are comfortable in the hottest summer or the chill of winter.
remove_message: You are exposed to the full effects of the weather.
decay_messages: The regulating effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Malaise Ward
desc: You are immune to sickness and poisoning.
remove_message: Your immunity to poison and disease fades away.
decay_messages: The immunity effect from your potion is fading.

name: Awake and Aware
desc: The potion is keeping you from needing to sleep.
remove_message: You are almost crushed by an overpowering wave of exhaustion.
decay_messages: You yawn suddenly.  Your potion must be fading.

name: Calm Stomach
desc: You no longer need to eat, but your throat is pretty dry.
remove_message: You need to eat once again.
decay_messages: Your stomach rumbles.  The potion must be fading away.

name: Vulnerary
desc: You can feel a soothing sensation lingering after applying salve to your wounds.
remove_message: The vulnerary's after-effects fade.
decay_messages: The after-effects of the vulnerary are fading.

name: Incense
desc: Your mind feels energized, warding off fatigue.
remove_message: The incense's effect fades.
decay_messages: The effects of the incense are fading.

name: Revenant Hunger
desc: Immunity to food poisoning and parasites, increased hunger gain.  Does not purge pre-existing conditions.

name: Lingering Chill
desc: An unearthly chill soaks deep into your very core, sapping the life from your body!
apply_message: A brutally cold wind chills you to the bone!
remove_message: The otherworldly chill leaves your body.

name: Hyperborean Mantle
desc: Protection against the effects of cold.
remove_message: For a moment you feel a terrible chill in the air, as the ward against cold fades.
decay_messages: Your mantle against cold is waning.

name: Mantle of the Frozen North
desc: Protection against the effects of cold, and any sources of direct damage.
remove_message: For a moment you feel a terrible chill in the air, as the greater ward against cold fades.
decay_messages: Your mantle against cold is waning.

name: The Unbound Heart
desc: Protection against paralytic and other hindering effects.
remove_message: You feel the otherworldly tension in your muscles leave your body, as the ward against paralytic effects fades.

name: Clarity Above All
desc: Protection against blindness, deafness, stuns, and dazing.
remove_message: You feel the wards guarding your vision and hearing fade.

name: Forge-Hardened Flesh
desc: Protection against most effects of heat.
remove_message: You feel a strange tingling sensation, as the ward against heat fades.
decay_messages: The charm against heat is waning.

name: Mantle of the Holocaust
desc: Complete immunity to fire, and to related side effects.
remove_message: You feel a strange tingling sensation, as the ward against flame fades.
decay_messages: The ward against flame is waning.

name: Sign of the Inferno
desc: Complete immunity to fire, and to related side effects.
remove_message: You feel a strange tingling sensation, as the ward against flame fades.
decay_messages: The ward against flame is waning.

name: Elemental Affinity
desc: No longer slowed down by heat exhaustion.  You are still vulnerable to the other side effects of heatstroke, and may blister in extreme temperatures.

name: Draconic Wings
desc: Immunity to fall damage.

name: Manifestation of Strength
desc: The strength and resilience of the legendary dragon.
remove_message: Your dragonic strength finally leaves you.
decay_messages: The strength of the dragon is fading.

name: Malevolent Gaze
desc: You are frozen in fear.

name: Corrupted Flesh
desc: Your flesh twitches and wriggles unnaturally.
remove_message: Your flesh finally settles down.

name: Clarity of Blood
desc: Protection against parasitic and corruptive threats, such as the Mycus.
remove_message: The soothing sensation coursing through your veins fades, as the protective magic dissipates.
decay_messages: Your clarity of blood spell is waning.

name: Ward Against Corrosion
desc: Protection against lingering acid effects.  Direct contact will still harm you.
remove_message: You feel a tingling sensation over your skin, as the protective magic fades.
decay_messages: Your ward against corrosion is waning.

name: Mantle of the Universal Solvent
desc: Complete immunity to acid damage, in addition to its aftereffects.
remove_message: You feel a tingling sensation over your skin, as the protective magic fades.
decay_messages: Your ward against acid is waning.

name: Mantle of Poison
desc: Protection against toxic gas and venom, steadily reduces accumulated radiation.
remove_message: You feel a momentary weakness as the protective magic fades.

name: Abjuration of the Darkness
desc: Protects against various anomalous effects.
remove_message: The magical protection fades.
decay_messages: Your ward against evil is waning.

name: Holy Ward
desc: Resistance to blade and bullet, protection from anomalous effects and cold-type damage.
remove_message: The magical protection enveloping your body flickers and fades.

name: Otherworldly Potence
desc: The fabric of The Veil is woven into your frame.  Your strength is augmented by magic.
remove_message: You feel weakened as your magically-induced strength leaves you.
decay_messages: Your spell of might is waning.

name: ZÃ©phuros's Grace
desc: The winds of distant realms are at your back.  Your dexterity and speed are augmented by magic.
remove_message: You feel sluggish as your magically-induced agility leaves you.
decay_messages: Your spell of agility is waning.

name: Opening the Inner Eye
desc: The eyes of The Beyond shall guide you.  Your perception is augmented by magic, and you can see clearly in darkness.
remove_message: You feel deadened as your magically-induced perception leaves you.
decay_messages: Your spell of insight is waning.

name: Revelation
desc: A flood of strange awareness has filled your mind.  Your intelligence has been temporarily augmented by magic, aiding spellcasting and crafting.
remove_message: Things are starting to return to normal.
decay_messages: Your spell of revelation is waning.

name: Eclipse
desc: Unholy power fuels you, strengthening your body with an unnatural adrenaline surge.
remove_message: You feel numb, hit with the sheer weight of the unnatural magic fading.
decay_messages: The blessing of the eclipse is waning.

name: Sight Beyond Sight
desc: You are surrounded by an ivory halo, allowing you to see without eyes.
remove_message: Your inner eye finally closes.
decay_messages: Your inner eye is beginning to close.

name: Obsidian Mantle of Shadows
desc: You are surrounded by roiling shadows that lash out at your enemies.
remove_message: The roiling shadows around you vanish.
decay_messages: The roiling shadows around you are dissipating.

hit_me_effect.message: Wisps of shadow lash out at %2$s
hit_me_effect.npc_message: Wisps of shadow jump from %1$s to %2$s.

name: Submersion into Nature
desc: You are hidden from the sight of the Beyond and other creatures from Outside, but are more visible to natural creatures.
remove_message: Your otherworldly guise drops.
decay_messages: Your otherworldly guise is beginning to fade.

name: Aura of Stolen Vitality
desc: You melee attacks drain the very life from your targets.
remove_message: Your enervating aura has faded.
decay_messages: The aura around your attacks is fading away.

//: Needs a higher max duration
name: Aura of Stolen Vitality
desc: You melee attacks drain the very life from your targets.
remove_message: Your enervating aura has faded.
decay_messages: The aura around your attacks is fading away.

name: Carmine Vitality
desc: You are healing extremely quickly.

name: Enervated
desc: Your energy was drained by blood magic.

name: Alchemical Ward
desc: Temporary resistance to the side effects of certain potion effects.

decay_messages: The forest talisman's blessing is waning.

name: Talismanic Enervation
desc: You are feeling fatigued as part of the aftermath of using the forest talisman.
remove_message: The aftereffects of using the forest talisman fades away.

name: Defender's Ward
desc: Immunity to debuffs such as blindness, bleeding, stunning, etc.  Targets additionally gain increased melee damage, accuracy, and dodge.

name: Revenant Blood
desc: Immunity to poisons, parasites, and fungus of all kinds; steadily reduces accumulated radiation.
remove_message: The protective effect of your sanguine mark fades, leaving a momentary itch in your veins.
//: Food poisoning and food parasites are already covered by Metabolic Adaptability.
decay_messages: The protective magic flowing through your blood is starting to wane.

name: Absorption Aftereffects
desc: Rapidly recovers stamina, increases healthiness.

name: Balm of Nature
desc: You are healing slowly over time.

Healing Overexertion

name: Retribution of the Whirlwind
desc: Wind constantly whirls around you, repelling nearby attackers away from you but cooling you as well.

hit_me_effect.message: %2$s is blown backward by the winds!

//: Proper Chosen are more acclimated to channeling He From Beyond The Veil's blessings.
name: Arcane Burnout
desc: Human minds and bodies were not made to be a conduit for such destructive energy.  Overuse won't kill you, but will make it harder to focus on spellcasting.

name: Abyssal Aura
desc: Constant pain and stamina recovery, in exchange for increased fatigue gain and steady healthiness decline.

name: Obfuscating Cloak
desc: Light seems to warp around you in an unnatural manner, rendering you invisible and protecting against various perception-related hazards.
remove_message: The shroud of illusion magic around you fades.
//: Immunity to blindness in general is the only way to make an effect reliably protect against flashbangs, so best justification is to counter things that mess with vision as a whole.  Does NOT protect against Glimpse of The Beyond, just because the host can't see you doesn't mean the archon can'tâ€¦
decay_messages: The illusions enveloping you are starting to fade.

name: Lesser Illusion Cloak
desc: Light seems to warp around you in an unnatural manner, rendering you invisible.

name: The Eye of the Storm
desc: Complete immunity to lightning, reduced speed.
remove_message: You feel an electric tingle as your protective magic fades.
decay_messages: The ward against lightning is waning.

name: Mantle of Thunderheads
desc: Complete immunity to lightning.
remove_message: You feel an electric tingle as your protective magic fades.
decay_messages: The mantle against lightning is waning.

//: Regular Ward Against Evil will only protect you a bit, you need Holy Ward to actually stop the effect.  This will be relevant once I add an encounter you can access after restoring the ritual blade.
name: Glimpse of The Beyond
desc: You caught the attention of something that doesn't belong in this worldâ€¦
remove_message: You feel a faint sense of relief wash over you.
miss_messages: Afterimages on the edge of your vision distract you.

Severe Otherworldly Offering
desc: You feel more weary lately, and it's getting hard to think straight.  Overuse of the chalice seems to have an effect on you.
It feels harder to focus on your surroundings.  Maybe using your own life force to fuel the chalice is a bad ideaâ€¦
Even when you aren't exhausted, you find it hard to stay awake.  This is going to be the death of you if you keep overusing that damn chalice!
You feel an odd sensation in the back of your head, an ethereal ache you can't quite explain.  It's like your very existence is crumbling away.
You feel an odd sensation in the back of your head, an ethereal ache you can't quite explain.  It's like your very existence is crumbling away.
You feel an odd sensation in the back of your head, an ethereal ache you can't quite explain.  It's like your very existence is crumbling away.
Your very essence is nothing more than fuel for the pyreâ€¦
//: This will EVENTUALLY kill you if you max out the effects, unless you're abusing magical healing.
This won't kill you, but the health and stat penalties will make you wish it did later on down the line.
name: Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Severe Strange Anemia
desc: Your muscles have been feeling more fatigued lately, and you feel faintly queasy on the inside.  Maybe overusing that athame did something to youâ€¦
You still feel fatigued more readily, and you've been having hunger pangs.  It seems blood magic has consequences if overused.
Your body feels sluggish and drained, and it seems to be getting worse the more you rely on blood magic.  Relying on it less might help ease your suffering.
It feels like your body is struggling to sustain itself, as your overuse of the athame's magic has taken its toll on you.  It might be a good idea to stop using that damn thing for a whileâ€¦
Using that athame so many times was a terrible mistake, you feel like you've been drained half to deathâ€¦

name: Enduring Blood
desc: Reduces the impact of Strange Anemia and mitigates its effects, outright preventing it if one uses the athame while under this effect, along with preventing wounds from bleeding.  Allows one to use the silver athame's sanguine rituals more freely.
apply_message: Something stirs in your veins as the staff's protective effect washes over you.
decay_messages: The effect of the staff's strange magic is waning.
remove_message: Your heart skips a beat briefly as your feel the staff's influence fade.

//: Explicitly punish Mycus players who will be immune to mutation, that's what you get for channeling a rival interloper's nature magic.

name: Environmental Shielding
desc: A barrier projected by your mech is currently providing resistance to acid and fire, plus immunity to toxic gas.  Also shields you from being blinded, and negates falling damage.
//: Protects against blindness since flares can dazzle targets, feather fall effect since mech is supposed to be able to fly.  Some effects of Free Action, Clarity of Blood, Ward Against Poison, Ward Against Fire, and Ward Against Acid.

name: Killing Surge
desc: You feel a rush of otherworldly adrenaline.
remove_message: The otherworldly adrenaline running through you fades.
decay_messages: You can feel the unnatural surge of adrenaline waning.

name: Killing Surge
desc: You feel a rush of otherworldly adrenaline and a killing lust in your heart.
remove_message: The otherworldly adrenaline running through you fades.
decay_messages: You can feel the unnatural surge of adrenaline waning.

name: Ethereal Guidance
desc: Should you master the secrets of this blade, wielding it will force portal storms to burn out earlier than normal.  Only the worthy will be offered protection.

name: Dimensional Mending
desc: Steady recovery of stamina, pain, and radiation, immunity to bleeding, poison, and infections for the duration.

name: Teleport Anchor
desc: You're not going anywhere.

name: Verdant Speed
desc: Make you faster if you are a triffid

name: Vegetative Grasp
desc: Roots and vines entangle your foes.
apply_message: Roots and vines burst from the ground and entangle you!
remove_message: The roots and vines wither up and die.

name: Lightened
desc: You feel much, much lighter.
remove_message: The magic buoying you up fades away.
decay_messages: You are starting to feel heavier.

name: Waterwalking
desc: You feel much, much lighter.
remove_message: You touch the ground once more.

name: Chill Aura
desc: An aura of cold air is protecting you from heat.
remove_message: A warm breeze touches your skin.
decay_messages: The cold aura around you is fading away.

name: Frozen Aura
desc: You cannot move because you are frozen.

desc: The bloodwalker has absorbed blood and is regenerating.

desc: You have made the proper preparations for a successful summonâ€¦hopefully.
